CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Sequence detections for obfuscation involving excluded events
CurrentVersion.description: This change enhances sequence detection to improve its effectiveness in identifying users who are performing obfuscation activities that may result in a data security incident, such as file renaming, to evade detection. With this improvement, Insider Risk Management can detect sequences that may result in potential data security incidents, even if the obfuscation activities in those sequences involve excluded events, such as an excluded keyword. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Meetings will suggest follow up questions to ask it

These questions will generally be based on the response it gave prior, and could be related to honing in on a particular topic, asking for more details, or even reformatting the content into a table if appropriate.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams can analyze content shared on-screen during a meeting
CurrentVersion.description: Now, Copilot in Teams can analyze content shared on-screen during a meeting when recording is enabled. This, along with meeting transcript and meeting chat, enables users to ask Copilot to summarize or find specific information from screen-shared content (e.g., ‘Which products had the highest sales?’), consolidate insights across both the conversation and presentation (e.g., 'What was the feedback per slide?'), and draft new content based on the entire meeting (e.g., 'Rewrite the paragraph shared on the screen incorporating the feedback from the chat’). This works for any content shared while sharing your desktop screen (including but not limited to documents, slides, spreadsheets, and websites, irrespective of platform or app). Support for PowerPoint Live and Whiteboard in Teams will be available at a later date.

With this new feature, an admin can choose whether they want to expire the Adaptive Protection insider risk level. Today, this expiration happens automatically, but you can now choose to keep the Adaptive Protection insider risk level for a user, even if their alert is dismissed or case is closed. CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Copy a publication within a campaign
CurrentVersion.description: Gone are the days where you must rewrite or manually copy and paste content from an old publication to a newly drafted one to reuse it. Soon in Viva Amplify, you will be able to copy a publication within an existing campaign with just a few clicks. This new feature streamlines the content creation process, enabling communicators to easily reuse existing content across SharePoint, Outlook, and Teams, including all channel-specific customizations and related audiences, saving you time and effort.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Multi-Geo In-Region Routing
CurrentVersion.description: Multi-Geo In-Region Routing (IRR) enables customers to control the routing of inbound emails to comply with regional data regulations. Using IRR, customers can set the geo-region that inbound mail should be routed to for specific Accepted Domains. By setting Accepted Domains to specific geo-regions and then adding users to that Accepted Domain that are located in the same geo-region as the Accepted Domain is set to route mail to, IRR ensures that emails are fully processed and stored in the user's region. This keeps data within the user’s Preferred Data Location (PDL), enhancing data sovereignty and compliance.

By setting Accepted Domains to specific geo-regions and then adding users to that Accepted Domain that are located in the same geo-region as the Accepted Domain is set to route mail to, IRR ensures that emails are fully processed and stored in the user's region. This keeps data within the user’s Preferred Data Location (PDL), enhancing data sovereignty and compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Detect workplace safety concerns in user-reported Teams messages
CurrentVersion.description:
Communication Compliance introduces the ability to identify and flag potential workplace safety concerns in user-reported Teams messages. Investigators now have an extra indication to decide what risk exists in user-reported messages and can configure an Inappropriate Content policy to proactively identify similar inappropriate content moving forward.

Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - New email scoring capabilities
CurrentVersion.description:
Insider risk management (IRM) email scoring logic is being updated. With current logic, a single email to multiple recipients is counted multiple times, creating noise by increasing the risk score. In the new logic, a single email to multiple recipients is counted once, and this new principle is applicable to the email containing multiple unallowed domains or priority content. Once this is rolled out, all the email insights in alerts will display the new count and score.  

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Once this is rolled out, all the email insights in alerts will display the new count and score.

Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Share user risk details with other security solutions [Government customers only]
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management is introducing sharing Insider Risk Management data with other Microsoft services for Government customers. When turned on, admins with the correct permissions will be able to review user risk details and alerts from Insider Risk Management within other solutions such as Data Loss Prevention (DLP), Communication Compliance, and Microsoft Defender.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Insider Risk Management extends its detection into multicloud environments by offering ready-to-use risk indicators in Azure, AWS, and SaaS apps including Box, Dropbox, Google Drive, and GitHub. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies.

CurrentVersion.description:
With this update, Insider Risk Management extends its risk detection capabilities to Microsoft Fabric products by offering ready-to-use risk indicators based on activities that may lead to a data security incident in Power BI. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Refreshed Engage Communities app in Teams mobile
CurrentVersion.description: New, mobile-first experience to participate in communities aligned to personal interests and job functions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Teams meetings for GCC
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot helps you run more effective meetings, get up to speed on the conversation, organize key discussion points, and summarize key actions so it’s clear what you need to do next. Users can type any question or use predetermined prompts during or after the meeting, and their interactions with Copilot are only visible to them. This feature is already available in worldwide multitenant and will now be available for customers in GCC.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Paste to Browser prevention support on macOS device with endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Endpoint Data Loss Prevention adds support for instances where users try to paste sensitive content into a web browser on macOS devices using Edge, Safari, and other browsers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - MacOS parity for full file evidence
CurrentVersion.description: Data Loss Prevention can copy the item that matches a DLP policy from onboarded MacOS devices to an Azure storage account. This creates full file evidence parity for MacOS.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Classification improvements on file read access in MacOS devices using Endpoint Data Loss Prevention
CurrentVersion.description: Data classification on files in MacOS devices will be triggered when handling files on read access to improve classification operations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Adding and editing external contacts
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, users will now be able to add and edit external contacts from Teams phone devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speed dial customization on line keys for touch phones
CurrentVersion.description:
This feature allows you to configure custom contacts and speed dial on the
line key of touch phone devices certified for Microsoft Teams. It
enables you to swiftly access frequently dialed numbers and contacts,
incorporating one-touch/press dialing and effortless management of contact
lists on touch devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for all participants to start collaborative annotations
CurrentVersion.description: All participants in meetings are now able to start collaborative annotations. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for all participants to start collaborative annotations
OldVersion.description: All participants in meetings are now able to start collaborative annotations. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Contact deduplication on New Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the Web
CurrentVersion.description: People are at the center of our lives, and we start every digital connection via contacts. Hence, a clean, up-to-date contact list is critical for better collaboration and productivity. We are happy to announce that cleaning up duplicate contacts just got a lot easier with the de-duplication feature on New Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the Web

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Existing Azure Board Migration
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will migrate boards that exist in your tenant's Azure storage to OneDrive for Business storage. More information will follow as we near release.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Sequence detections for obfuscation involving excluded events
CurrentVersion.description: This change enhances sequence detection to improve its effectiveness in identifying users who are performing obfuscation activities that may result in a data security incident, such as file renaming, to evade detection. With this improvement, Insider Risk Management can detect sequences that may result in potential data security incidents, even if the obfuscation activities in those sequences involve excluded events, such as an excluded keyword. CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management | Adaptive Protection - Multi-policy selection
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now select multiple Insider Risk Management policies in the "Risk levels for Adaptive Protection" settings to assign risk levels in Adaptive Protection. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service for bulk custom access
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow a Glint Admin to apply custom access in bulk through Roles

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Microsoft Information Protection (MIP) trainable classifiers
CurrentVersion.description: Leverage trainable classifiers from Microsoft Information Protection (MIP) to recognize various content types specific to your organization. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Co-organizer updates in Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: Co-organizers can edit webinar details, publish the event, and cancel the event, similar to the organizer.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Containers in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
CurrentVersion.description: Containers are a powerful tool for organizing and managing complex diagrams. Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to use containers in Visio for the web to create professional-looking diagrams that are easy to understand and navigate.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Portfolio capabilities in Planner
CurrentVersion.description: Structure plans into portfolios and get insights on top of your portfolios

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Meetings will suggest follow up questions to ask it
CurrentVersion.description: When Copilot in Teams Meetings responds to a prompt, it will also suggest follow up prompts to ask Copilot that build on the prior response. These questions will generally be based on the response it gave prior, and could be related to honing in on a particular topic, asking for more details, or even reformatting the content into a table if appropriate.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams can analyze content shared on-screen during a meeting
CurrentVersion.description: Now, Copilot in Teams can analyze content shared on-screen during a meeting when recording is enabled. This, along with meeting transcript and meeting chat, enables users to ask Copilot to summarize or find specific information from screen-shared content (e.g., ‘Which products had the highest sales?’), consolidate insights across both the conversation and presentation (e.g., 'What was the feedback per slide?'), and draft new content based on the entire meeting (e.g., 'Rewrite the paragraph shared on the screen incorporating the feedback from the chat’). This works for any content shared while sharing your desktop screen (including but not limited to documents, slides, spreadsheets, and websites, irrespective of platform or app). Support for PowerPoint Live and Whiteboard in Teams will be available at a later date.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention-Improving DLP Policy tip text for matched recipients in Outlook win32
CurrentVersion.description: We are updating the DLP Policy tip text in Outlook windows desktop client that appears when end users attempt to send a sensitive email to recipients who are not authorized by your organization's DLP policies. Users will soon receive a more gentle policy tip nudge to review recipients and content before sending email.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Message/Attachment contains EXO predicates
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on DLP evaluation on specific email components like email body or attachments only. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components only.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Schedule reports
CurrentVersion.description: The feature enables users to schedule the export of reports on a recurring or on-demand basis. Additionally, users will be notified when the exported report or items are ready for use and download.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Co-organizer updates in town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Co-organizers can edit town hall details, publish the event, and cancel the event, similar to the organizer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom background for Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can upload custom background images on the Teams admin center to reinforce their company brand on their Teams Rooms devices. The main room display, extended room display, and touch console can each have its own specific background image. PNG, JPG, and JPEG, formats are supported. This feature is only available with the Teams Rooms Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Access to M365 header
CurrentVersion.description: Solution displays M365 header in Viva Glint to improve discoverability of other M365 apps

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection - Enhancements to insider risk level settings
CurrentVersion.description: This roadmap item was updated to 'launched' unintentionally. We apologize for the inconvenience. With this new feature, an admin can choose whether they want to expire the Adaptive Protection insider risk level. Today, this expiration happens automatically, but you can now choose to keep the Adaptive Protection insider risk level for a user, even if their alert is dismissed or case is closed. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Add Shared Folders to Favorites in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Customers will have the ability to add shared folders to their favorites. This enhancement offers users increased flexibility and convenience, allowing easy and quick access to important shared content directly from their Favorites list. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage content in Workplace Search
CurrentVersion.description: As users search in office.com, sharepoint.com, bing at work they will find content from Viva Engage in the search results. We will first start with question posts and then roll out discussion posts from Engage.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Automatic data preservation for high-risk users
CurrentVersion.description: Adaptive Protection in Microsoft Purview helps you protect your organization’s data by integrating dynamic insider risk levels, determined by data related activities, with various policy engines to automatically moving users in and out of policies as their risk levels change over time. The integration with Data Lifecycle Management will automatically apply retention labels to preserve deleted emails and files based on a user’s insider risk level.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Entry point change - apps when reading emails moved to the ribbon
CurrentVersion.description: The Apps flyout and entry point for pinned apps will be moved to the Home tab in the Ribbon in the New Outlook and Outlook for Web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Pages - Updated Hero web part with new layout & styles
CurrentVersion.description: The reimagined hero web part will feature a carousel layout and a selection of new styles, creating an eye-catching and engaging experience at the top of the page.

CurrentVersion.title: Universal Print: Mobile print on Android phones
CurrentVersion.description: Integration of Universal Print with the Microsoft 365 mobile app will enable users to add work/school printers to their Android phones. Once the printers are installed on the phone, the user can print to them from any phone app that has a print action.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel with Python
CurrentVersion.description: With Copilot, you can use natural language to describe the analysis you want to perform, and it will automatically generate, explain, and insert Python code into your Excel spreadsheet. This integration unlocks powerful analytics via Python for visualizations, cleaning data, machine learning, predictive analytics, and more—without needing to be Python proficient yourself. We are updating this item to reflect that the feature is currently available within the USA, Australia, and the UK, and is still rolling out to all other geolocations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Improved Report PDF Exports
CurrentVersion.description: PDFs exported from Glint Reports are improved to be easily printable, searchable, and readable.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Retention Labels are available for Loop pages and components
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations that rely on Microsoft's records management capabilities in Purview can now include Loop content in their workflows with Retention Labels on Loop pages and components. There's an in-app experience when a label is applied or a record is locked.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Support S/MIME in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: New Outlook for Windows will support S/MIME (Secure/Multipurpose Internet Mail extensions) signing and encryption. All new and existing S/MIME configurations will work without any explicit action from admins. The feature was already available for Web and now we are extending its availability to New Outlook. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Updated conversation actions on Outlook for Android
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, when viewing a message, you can access the available actions in the top-right corner. We are updating these actions to be at the bottom of the screen with the ability to customize the order and placement of the actions to suit your needs.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Windows app - New protected virtual printer
CurrentVersion.description: This creates the new virtual printer—OneNote (Desktop) - Protected—for OneNote Windows app, built on top of the Microsoft IPP class print driver. This printer will be compliant and functional with Widows Protected Print (WPP) mode.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Bidirectional support for Teams Live Interpretation
CurrentVersion.description: With bidirectional support in Teams Live Interpretation, interpreters can now switch the direction they want to provide translation in between the two languages by clicking on the button of the language they want to interpret into at the bottom of the screen. The highlighted language button will be the language the interpreter is translating into and attendees hear from.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Use Copilot to select and rewrite specific pieces of text in an email in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: In classic Outlook for Windows, when composing an email, customers can select portions of text in an email and use Copilot to rewrite it. Users can give detailed instructions on how to rewrite and also able to modify tone and length.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Default sensitivity labels and policies enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: Eligible customers can activate default labels and policies for Microsoft Purview Information Protection that now extend to meetings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Copy a publication within a campaign
CurrentVersion.description: Gone are the days where you must rewrite or manually copy and paste content from an old publication to a newly drafted one to reuse it. Soon in Viva Amplify, you will be able to copy a publication within an existing campaign with just a few clicks. This new feature streamlines the content creation process, enabling communicators to easily reuse existing content across SharePoint, Outlook, and Teams, including all channel-specific customizations and related audiences, saving you time and effort.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Multi-Geo In-Region Routing
CurrentVersion.description: Multi-Geo In-Region Routing (IRR) enables customers to control the routing of inbound emails to comply with regional data regulations. Using IRR, customers can set the geo-region that inbound mail should be routed to for specific Accepted Domains. By setting Accepted Domains to specific geo-regions and then adding users to that Accepted Domain that are located in the same geo-region as the Accepted Domain is set to route mail to, IRR ensures that emails are fully processed and stored in the user's region. This keeps data within the user’s Preferred Data Location (PDL), enhancing data sovereignty and compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Microsoft 365 Copilot usage report - Admins can view line of business agent usage
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can view line of business Copilot agent usage in their tenant from the Microsoft 365 admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - AI & Copilot Resources provider
CurrentVersion.description: The AI & Copilot Resources provider will power the OOB Microsoft Copilot Academy and will be visible by default to users who have Copilot licenses. Admins will be able to enable, disable, and apply permissions on the content of this provider.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Choose how many days of emails sync to your device for offline usage
CurrentVersion.description: With the new sync window, you can choose how many days' worth of emails and attachments you want to download to your device so you can always access them even while offline.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Copy list of attendees to clipboard
CurrentVersion.description: Allow users to copy the list of attendees to clipboard from calendar event. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: People Hub improvements in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: In new Outlook for Windows, the People Hub offers a streamlined contacts interface with a single view of each person, automatically linking duplicates and enriching them with organizational profiles. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Dashboard - Non-Copilot cohort and exclusion list using AAD Groups (Entra ID)
CurrentVersion.description: For the Copilot dashboard, the non-Copilot user cohort list and exclusion list can be managed by Global Administrators using AAD (Azure Active Directory) Groups.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Oversharing Pop-up enhancements on Outlook win32 desktop
CurrentVersion.description: We are expanding the functionality of oversharing pop-ups (Show policy tip as a dialog) in outlook win32 to support additional scenarios powered with predicates such as Content is not labeled and Message/Attachment is not labeled, File extension is. It will also support a customizable oversharing dialog with the ability to configure custom title, body, business justifications, and dynamic variables/tokens for matched recipients, attachment names, and labels.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Automatically display auto-mapped calendars
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to automatically see their auto-mapped calendars when toggling from classic Outlook to the new. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Enrich triage in Communication Compliance with Insider Risk context
CurrentVersion.description: Enhance the triage experience in communication compliance with Insider Risk Insights. This integration provides investigators with a deeper understanding of the risk profile of message senders, along with a more comprehensive view of the sender’s risk severity and historical risk-related actions. With this enriched context, investigators are empowered to make more informed and effective remediation decisions, ensuring a robust compliance posture.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Microsoft 365 Copilot Usage report - Business Chat
CurrentVersion.description: The Microsoft 365 Copilot usage report in the Microsoft 365 admin center will be updated to include usage of Microsoft 365 Copilot Business Chat (web) along with the existing usage data for Business Chat (work). It will also include enabled users and active users adoption information for new entry points Edge and Microsoft 365 App for Microsoft 365 Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Outlook win32 DLP Policy tip & oversharing popup support for new DLP Predicates
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates support for DLP Policy tips and Oversharing popups for E5 users: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on client-side evaluation on specific email components (like email body or attachments) only. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components only and show DLP Policy tips and oversharing popups accordingly in Outlook win32.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sort by Flag option
CurrentVersion.description: We are adding support for sort by flag status, flag due date and flag start date.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sort by category
CurrentVersion.description: This adds the ability to sort by category in Outlook for Mac.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Agents in SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint users can create an agent in SharePoint simply by selecting the SharePoint sites and/or files. Share these agents with your team to use in SharePoint and/or Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Take notes with Copilot in OneNote directly in the flow from the canvas
CurrentVersion.description: Gather and create notes with Copilot in your personal non-shared OneNote notebooks directly on the page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Notify Users about Hidden Content Matches in Communication Compliance
CurrentVersion.description: This feature is designed to enhance transparency by introducing a notification banner that alerts users when keywords embedded in hidden content, such as hyperlinks or encoded strings, trigger a compliance policy match. With this update, investigators will be able to quickly recognize that some or all keyword matches are not immediately visible in the main content body, saving time and ensuring a more efficient triage experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Email verification for external attendees to join Teams meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting organizers can have greater confidence about external attendees joining Teams meetings, this capability enables sending a one-time passcode to the external attendee’s email address for that individual to use during a verification step when joining a Teams meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Custom question benchmark mapping
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Glint survey creators will be able to associate a custom question with a Viva Glint benchmark to leverage the benchmark in the reporting UI.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Message/Attachment contains EXO predicates
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on DLP evaluation on only specific email components like email body or attachments. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Edge Settings Improvements
CurrentVersion.description: Edge Settings is migrating to WebUI2 to boost page responsiveness and introducing a series of minor visual and content upgrades to improve overall usability and utility. This includes optimizing for concise wording of individual settings, simplifying the number of pages and reorganizing content, and creating a cohesive user interface.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Decorate your background for GCC and GCC environments (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Decorate your background is now available to customers in the GCC and GCC High environments. Decorate your background is a generative background effect in Teams that makes meetings more fun and personal by using AI to spruce up your meeting background. Blend your physical and digital spaces, enabling you to revamp what’s seen of your physical meeting space for each call. This technology allows for effortless room clean-ups, adding virtual plants, or festive decorations for special events. Decorate your background requires a Teams Premium license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Decorate your background for GCC and GCC High environments (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Decorate your background is now available to customers in the GCC and GCC High environments. Decorate your background is a generative background effect in Teams that makes meetings more fun and personal by using AI to spruce up your meeting background. Blend your physical and digital spaces, enabling you to revamp what’s seen of your physical meeting space for each call. This technology allows for effortless room clean-ups, adding virtual plants, or festive decorations for special events. Decorate your background requires a Teams Premium license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Support for dwell time graph in Amplify reporting
CurrentVersion.description: This release will add a dwell time graph to Amplify reporting. The dwell time graph will indicate the average time users spend reading a publication, giving important insight into the engagement of users with the Amplify campaign. This graph will be supported from SharePoint and Outlook channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Usage reports for bookable desks in the Pro Management portal
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can now access reports on bookable desk spaces in the Teams Rooms Pro Management portal to assist with workspace optimization and planning. Reports include analytics on peripherals, usage, reservations, and occupancy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Updated Context IQ menu in Business Chat
CurrentVersion.description: Updates to Copilot Context IQ menu provides an intuitive and seamless interaction improving reliability and performance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): BizChat - Copilot agents available in Business Chat web mode
CurrentVersion.description: In Business Chat web mode, discover and use Copilot agents available for your organization. Agents are custom grounded chats that include specific knowledge sources from work and web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Detect workplace safety concerns in user-reported Teams messages
CurrentVersion.description:
Communication Compliance introduces the ability to identify and flag potential workplace safety concerns in user-reported Teams messages. Investigators now have an extra indication to decide what risk exists in user-reported messages and can configure an Inappropriate Content policy to proactively identify similar inappropriate content moving forward.

Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Workplace check-in with Workplace Presence
CurrentVersion.description: With Workplace Presence, employees will have the ability to check in to the office in Outlook, Teams, and Places to confirm their work plans, receive check-in reminders, and view others nearby and who planned to come in. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Configure External access policies in TAC
CurrentVersion.description: External access policies can be managed in Teams admin center. These policies were previously only supported in PowerShell, and we are bringing the same capabilities into the Teams admin center user experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Town halls now available in GCC-High
CurrentVersion.description: Set up and host large scale events across a GCC-High organization with the familiar Teams app you use for webinars and meetings using town hall. Town hall capabilities include a new meeting template, capacity for up to 10k attendees, green room, the ability to manage what attendees see, RTMP-in, live translated captions, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Town halls in GCC-High (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Set up and host large scale events across a GCC-High organization with the familiar Teams app you use for meetings using town hall. Town hall capabilities include a new meeting template, capacity for up to 20k attendees, green room, the ability to manage what attendees see, RTMP-in, live translated captions, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Optimized hover actions in the message list on Outlook on the Web and New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The hover actions in the message list will be modified to be more space efficient and minimize unnecessary mouse travel. This change primarily affects users with the multicolumn (wider) message list. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Unified Planner tab experience in Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: With this unified tab experience, you can now create and add any basic or premium plan to a Planner tab in Microsoft Teams. To try it, go to any Teams channel and search for Planner after selecting the Apps icon.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Add emails as attachments while composing an email on Outlook for iOS and Android
CurrentVersion.description: Now while you are composing in Outlook for iOS or Android, you can use the same attach option you already know to select and attach emails to your mail.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Gain DLP policy insights with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot for Security in DLP is capable of summarizing DLP policies. This enhancement enables DLP admins to gain insights on coverage of policies viz. location, classifiers and notifications, and more. 
 
DLP admins can get these insights on all the policies or on few selected policies. They will be able to use prompts to gain a deeper view of how a policy is configured for their digital landscape. This helps them align their data posture on a regular basis and make corrections to policy posture as needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: iPad Multi-Window Support
CurrentVersion.description: Teams now supports multiple windows on iPad. Effortlessly organize your Split View experience with two Teams windows to easily navigate across meetings, chats, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Presenter Chat while screensharing
CurrentVersion.description: Enable presenters to more easily access the meeting chat while screensharing by adding an entry point in the presenter toolbar.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Schedule messages in channels
CurrentVersion.description: Like in chat, you can now schedule send messages in channels. You can optimize the timing of your messages based on the recipient's work hours, out-of-office time, etc, and ensuring your messages are delivered at the most suitable time.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Enhanced functionalities to manage SharePoint Embedded Containers through SharePoint Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: The new update empowers the SharePoint Embedded Administrators (SPE Admins) to manage their containers better through sorting and filtering capabilities as well as set sensitivity labels on containers. The SPE Admins now also have user role management capabilities to add, reassign, or remove users from various roles of a container.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Customize the location of Teams notifications
CurrentVersion.description: You can now customize where your Teams notification appear on your screen. Options include bottom right, top right, bottom left, and top left, allowing you to choose the most convenient and least intrusive location for a better experience and productivity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): BizChat – File Sensitivity Labels in Copilot web grounding chat
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot web grounding chat responses will now show content sensitivity labels for prompts in which a user has attached or uploaded a Microsoft 365 file like Word, Excel, and PowerPoint in Business Chat web mode and Microsoft Copilot chat.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - New email scoring capabilities
CurrentVersion.description:
Insider risk management (IRM) email scoring logic is being updated. With current logic, a single email to multiple recipients is counted multiple times, creating noise by increasing the risk score. In the new logic, a single email to multiple recipients is counted once, and this new principle is applicable to the email containing multiple unallowed domains or priority content. Once this is rolled out, all the email insights in alerts will display the new count and score.  

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Forward messages with app cards
CurrentVersion.description: Messages containing app cards in chats and channels can now be forwarded. To use, navigate to the more actions menu of any message containing an app card, and select "Forward".

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Forward messages with app cards
CurrentVersion.description: Messages containing app cards in chats and channels can now be forwarded. To use, navigate to the more actions menu of any message containing an app card, and select "Forward".

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Forwarding loop components
CurrentVersion.description: You can now forward chat messages containing Loop components, allowing for seamless sharing and real-time collaboration across different chats. To forward a message, navigate to it, click on the ellipsis, and select ‘Forward’ from the menu.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Forward messages to and from channels
CurrentVersion.description: You can now forward messages between channels, allowing you to efficiently share important information with relevant team members. To forward a channel message post, channel post reply, or chat message to another channel, 1:1 or group chat, select the message’s ellipsis menu and choose Forward.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Keyword monitoring email notification enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: This revamps the existing content alert (keyword monitoring) emails that admins receive to include added context on the content being monitored and minor security enhancements.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Minimize the compose window to multitask in the Outlook app for iOS and Android
CurrentVersion.description: Outlook will help you compose emails more quickly and efficiently by allowing you to minimize your draft emails and quickly access them again from the message list or calendar view. This means that, while composing an email, you can easily get information you need from your calendar or other emails and easily get back into the draft you are working on without ever having to go to the Draft folder.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Account descriptions
CurrentVersion.description: Outlook users can now set custom descriptions for their accounts, making them easier to tell apart in the folder list and various lists and menus across the application. The description can be set in the account settings. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Read Aloud support added to Copilot chat responses
CurrentVersion.description: Read Aloud capability lets you listen to Copilot responses in the chat pane.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Information Protection: Protect your most sensitive content with double key encryption
CurrentVersion.description:
Double Key Encryption (DKE) provides organizations with a second encryption key for your most sensitive content.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/double-key-encryption

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Delegates can now create new categories for the account owner's Calendar
CurrentVersion.description: Delegates can now create new categories on behalf of the person who granted them permissions. They can also apply said categories to the Calendar of that same person who granted them permissions. Delegates can view the list of the delegator's Categories by visiting the Accounts > Categories page of the Settings window and selecting the delegator's account from the dropdown. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Preview for Pages and News
CurrentVersion.description: This creates Preview mode for authors to view how their Pages and News will look across different device types while editing.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel with Python Language Expansion for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Using everyday language, ask Copilot to perform advanced analytics that would usually take you hours or is beyond your skillset like machine learning, predictive forecasting, and more. Copilot will write Python code for you and insert it on the grid, resulting in deeper insights and stunning visuals. Available on Excel for Windows in English, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Brazilian Portuguese, and Spanish, with additional languages coming soon.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Discover all prompt collections in the new Copilot Prompt Gallery app within Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description: The new Copilot Prompt Gallery app provides a central place to find, save, and share prompts available from Microsoft 365 Copilot apps and agents. You can also explore and use a curated selection of suggested prompts organized by role, function, or industry. This app will be available on Teams, Outlook and www.microsoft365.com.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Developers can create, test and update custom engine agents to run in Microsoft 365 Copilot and Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Developers can create, test and update custom engine agents using Teams Toolkit & Microsoft Copilot Studio, so that they can run in Microsoft 365 Copilot and Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Developers can use Kiota as an API plugin generation tool
CurrentVersion.description: Developers using Teams Toolkit and Kiota can use them together as an API plugin generation tool. This unlocks new scenarios like searching our repository of public APIs, visually selecting the main integration endpoints and improving the maintainability of existing plugins by using a workspace file and allowing full regeneration of plugin files.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Status report emails with Project Manager Agent
CurrentVersion.description: A new feature in the Project Manager Agent automates the creation of status report emails for your plans. This capability streamlines project updates by generating concise, accurate, and professional email summaries based on your plan's progress, key milestones, and upcoming tasks. With this feature, you can ensure stakeholders stay informed effortlessly, saving time while maintaining transparency and alignment across your projects.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Smart backgrounds for basic plans
CurrentVersion.description: Get ready to customize your plans like never before! With smart backgrounds, you’ll be able to quickly spot the right plans. This feature was part of our legacy Planner experience, and we’re now enabling it for basic plans in the new Planner.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Graph: Graph API - New Outlook for Windows usage
CurrentVersion.description: New Outlook for Windows usage will be added to the Microsoft Graph API, allowing organizations to monitor the adoption and usage of the new Outlook for Windows client within their organization. This will facilitate the creation of customized reports and analytics. Metrics included in the Graph API will match those available in new Outlook for Windows usage of Microsoft 365 apps usage report in the Microsoft 365 admin center, including tenant-level count of active users who have transitioned from Outlook for Windows (classic) to the new Outlook for Windows, as well as flags indicating usage of the new or classic Outlook per user over the specified time period.

CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: Resize is enabled for Windows 365 Frontline Cloud PCs
CurrentVersion.description: When changing the Cloud PC size on a specific assignment within the provisioning policy for W365 Frontline, all of the Cloud PCs in that assignment will be resized to the newly selected Cloud PC size.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Syntex Optical Character Recognition (OCR) extends support for Microsoft Office files
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint OCR feature now extends support to Microsoft Office files. Previously, OCR was limited to PDFs and images but with this update, you can seamlessly extract and utilize text from any embedded images within any Microsoft Office files like Word, PowerPoint, and Excel.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Summarize email attachments with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: You will now be able to summarize PDF, Word, and PowerPoint email attachments with Copilot in Outlook on the web and new Outlook for Windows. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Webinars in DoD
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Webinars are now available for the DoD community. DoD users can now schedule webinar instances with internal audiences, and leverage capabilities such as creation of an event page, attendee registration, automated emails, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Department graph for Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI
CurrentVersion.description: A new graph added to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI displays the departments of users interacting with M365 Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Quick sharing of files in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Share a file from a chat conversation, Shared tab or a channel post to 1:1 chats, group chats, or channels with fewer clicks. When files are shared, their permissions are maintained, ensuring that recipients have the appropriate access rights. You can add additional information to your message and @mention recipients for greater clarity and alignment.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Quick sharing of files in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Share a file from a chat conversation, Shared tab or a channel post to 1:1 chats, group chats, or channels with fewer clicks. When files are shared, their permissions are maintained, ensuring that recipients have the appropriate access rights. You can add additional information to your message and @mention recipients for greater clarity and alignment.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Native Bluetooth call controls over Hands-Free Protocol for multiple peripheral devices
CurrentVersion.description: When you have several peripheral devices connected to Teams, the one you use to answer a call will temporarily become the main device that will be syncing with Teams when using its buttons. After the call, the original device selected in Teams settings will take over again. You can now use multiple native Bluetooth devices and be confident that call controls will function correctly with all of them.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Post and reply to questions as an organizer
CurrentVersion.description: Town hall and webinar organizers now have the ability to post and reply to questions using the title “organizer” in the Q&A experience, instead of their individual names. This feature allows instance organizers to present a unified and official voice when responding to attendee questions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Share user risk details with other security solutions [Government customers only]
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management is introducing sharing Insider Risk Management data with other Microsoft services for Government customers. When turned on, admins with the correct permissions will be able to review user risk details and alerts from Insider Risk Management within other solutions such as Data Loss Prevention (DLP), Communication Compliance, and Microsoft Defender.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Support for multicloud environments
CurrentVersion.description:
Insider Risk Management extends its detection into multicloud environments by offering ready-to-use risk indicators in Azure, AWS, and SaaS apps including Box, Dropbox, Google Drive, and GitHub. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies.  

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Microsoft Fabric risk indicators in Insider Risk Management
CurrentVersion.description:
With this update, Insider Risk Management extends its risk detection capabilities to Microsoft Fabric products by offering ready-to-use risk indicators based on activities that may lead to a data security incident in Power BI. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies.  

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Refreshed Engage Communities app in Teams mobile
CurrentVersion.description: New, mobile-first experience to participate in communities aligned to personal interests and job functions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Teams meetings for GCC
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot helps you run more effective meetings, get up to speed on the conversation, organize key discussion points, and summarize key actions so it’s clear what you need to do next. Users can type any question or use predetermined prompts during or after the meeting, and their interactions with Copilot are only visible to them. This feature is already available in worldwide multitenant and will now be available for customers in GCC.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Paste to Browser prevention support on macOS device with endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Endpoint Data Loss Prevention adds support for instances where users try to paste sensitive content into a web browser on macOS devices using Edge, Safari, and other browsers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - MacOS parity for full file evidence
CurrentVersion.description: Data Loss Prevention can copy the item that matches a DLP policy from onboarded MacOS devices to an Azure storage account. This creates full file evidence parity for MacOS.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Classification improvements on file read access in MacOS devices using Endpoint Data Loss Prevention
CurrentVersion.description: Data classification on files in MacOS devices will be triggered when handling files on read access to improve classification operations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Adding and editing external contacts
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, users will now be able to add and edit external contacts from Teams phone devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speed dial customization on line keys for touch phones
CurrentVersion.description:
This feature allows you to configure custom contacts and speed dial on the
line key of touch phone devices certified for Microsoft Teams. It
enables you to swiftly access frequently dialed numbers and contacts,
incorporating one-touch/press dialing and effortless management of contact
lists on touch devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for all participants to start collaborative annotations
CurrentVersion.description: All participants in meetings are now able to start collaborative annotations. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Contact deduplication on New Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the Web
CurrentVersion.description: People are at the center of our lives, and we start every digital connection via contacts. Hence, a clean, up-to-date contact list is critical for better collaboration and productivity. We are happy to announce that cleaning up duplicate contacts just got a lot easier with the de-duplication feature on New Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the Web
